entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
